metadata.name: To Touch Forever
metadata.description:
To Touch Forever

Carlosâ€™ acrylic on canvas paintings unapologetically depict idyllic scenes devoid of irony or cynicism, stemming from his personal philosophy about life and beyond. Drawing the viewer into the world he paints, he puts focus on savouring life and at the same time, fixes their eyes on the promises of eternity.

1920px x 1080px

Animated by Motioneer Isaiah Cacnio.
